Detailed Description

This is a simple wrapper class that allows texture coordinate arrays to be held by SPtrs, and therfore have them delete correctly when used in an ArrayList.

See also:
Trimesh
ArrayList
Author:
Ben Constable
Version:
1.0

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

TexCoord::TexCoord ( int  cSize )

Default constructor.

Create a new array of tex coords of the given size. The size is the number of INDIVIDUAL COORDINATES in the array. So for 4 tex coords, each consisting of a u and v position, the size will be 8.

Parameters:
cSizesize of array
